message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a great starting point, and I'm open to negotiations.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $12000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it. I believe it's a great product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $11000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer it to you for $10500. This is still a great deal considering the product's value and quality.
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still not sure I can get to $10500. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I understand this is your final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10800. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

I understand you're trying to make one last concession, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go above $10000. I'm willing to meet you at this price, and I think it's a fair deal for both of us. Can we finalize the sale at $10000?

I understand you're firm on the price, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10200. This is my final offer, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

I've made my final offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. If you're not willing to accept this price, I'll have to consider buying from another seller. I'm not willing to go any higher.
